content:
On Maths challenges for the Lean curious (https://tinyurl.com/LeanMathsChallenges, was recommended to do after natural numbers game), in challenge 5, the first import line fails and gives:
image.png
this is in the lean web editor, how can I fix this?
yeah hard luck, they worked in 2019 and they've now rotted.
At that time I had no idea of the importance of setting things up as a correctly-formatted Lean repo, these were things I was just writing for Imperial students.
so, is there anything I can do? or just skip that one?

See the readme:

Note: this is not a functioning Lean repository! This is simply a collection of files written by Kevin Buzzard and his students between 2017 and 2019 as we experimented with how to teach Lean parts of Imperial College's undergraduate mathematics degree.
Try deleting all the imports and replace with import tactic
gaming with yoty has marked this topic as resolved.
